scannerCode.desc: Method wait\(\) can be invoked with monitor of other object locked
scannerCode.name: AWWID

scannerCode.desc: *parameter and this parameter is used without check for NULL
scannerCode.name: null_param

scannerCode.desc: Comparison always produces the same result
scannerCode.name: same_result

scannerCode.desc: Switch case constant * can't be produced by switch expression
scannerCode.name: CCNP

scannerCode.desc: Inequality comparison can be replaced with equality comparison
scannerCode.name: CCBS
